reviews.text: Dark amber coloured, this beer has pretty concentrated taste in highs, but lacks base. Goes well with anything hot and salty
Very smooth and bready taste. Some woody notes. A very easy going one. Perfect with roasted peanuts (not salty) and smoked cheese.
Put yourself under the sun with a cold Ausesken Blanca. Stay with it, feel it sparkling down your throat and you?ll have nice moments...
